main event: At least 2 circular, luminous objects were observed moving rapidly at high speed in South Charleston, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on October 6, 1964, at 2205 hours., The objects exhibited erratic movement patterns., The duration of the sighting was approximately 30 seconds., The weather conditions during the sighting were described as clear and cool., The report was subsequently made to the U.S. Air Force as part of Project Blue Book.
